Welcome to **Jeff**, your personal task assistant!
Jeff helps you manage tasks, deadlines, and events efficiently through simple commands.
This guide explains all the commands Jeff supports and shows Commands of their usage.
Adds a simple task to your list.
Ok, I've added a ToDo task:
There are 1 task(s) in the list.
Adds a task with a specific deadline.
Ok, I've added a Deadline task:
There are 2 task(s) in the list.
Adds an event with start and end times.
Ok, I've added an Event task:
There are 3 task(s) in the list.
Displays all tasks stored in your list.
Here are the tasks in your list:
Finds tasks containing a keyword in their description.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
Displays tasks scheduled for a specific date.
Ok, I've marked this task as done:
Marks a task as not completed.
Ok, I've marked this task as not done:
Removes a task from your list.
There are 2 task(s) in the list.
Displays all available commands and their usage.
Bye. Hope to see you again soon!
Jeff will close automatically in 5 seconds...
* The main entry point of the Jeff application.
* {@code Jeff} is a command-line task management program that reads and
* executes user commands, and persists tasks to local storage.
Hello! I'm Jeff, your personal task assistant.
Need a hand? Type `help` to see what I can do!""";

Here's what Jeff can do for you!
deadline [desc] /by [time] - Add a task with a deadline
event [desc] /from [start] /to [end] - Add an event with start and end times
list - Show all tasks in your list
find [keyword] - Search tasks containing a keyword
schedule [date] - Show tasks scheduled for a specific date
mark [task id] - Mark a task as completed
unmark [task id] - Mark a task as not completed
delete [task id] - Remove a task from your list
